mapper.select: SELECT u.* ,(SELECT grade_name FROM tb_grade2 g WHERE g.user_grade = u.user_grade) grade_name FROM tb_user2 u WHERE user_no = #{user_no }

SELECT board.article_title, board.create_date , is_delete , (SELECT board_name FROM tb_boardclass2 WHERE board_no = board.board_no) board_name FROM tb_board2 board WHERE user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY article_no DESC

SELECT c.comment_content, c.create_date, is_delete , (SELECT board_name FROM tb_boardclass2 WHERE board_no = c.board_no) board_name , (SELECT article_title FROM tb_board2 WHERE article_no = c.article_no) article_title FROM tb_comment2 c WHERE user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY c.comment_no DESC

SELECT p.pay_date, p.price, p.pay_status, u.user_grade, g.grade_name FROM tb_payment2 p INNER JOIN tb_user2 u ON u.user_no = p.user_no INNER JOIN tb_grade2 g ON g.user_grade = u.user_grade WHERE p.user_no = #{user_no}
